#summary The list of built-in CRC standards provided by Hasher.

Contrary to popular belief, there is more than one way to perform a Cyclic Redundency Check. Classless.Hasher will support polynomials that are 8, 16, 32 or 64 bits long, as well as an assortment of algorithm options. Classless.Hasher has built-in support for the following standards:


|| *Name* || *Polynomial* || *Initial Value* || *XOR Output* || *Reflection* || *Aliases* ||
|| CRC8 || 0x07 || 0 || 0 || No ||  ||
|| CRC8_ICODE || 0x1D || 0xFD || 0 || No ||  ||
|| CRC8_ITU || 0x07 || 0 || 0x55 || No ||  ||
|| CRC8_MAXIM || 0x31 || 0 || 0 || Yes ||  ||
|| CRC8_WCDMA || 0x9B || 0 || 0 || Yes ||  ||
|| CRC16 || 0x8005 || 0 || 0 || Yes || CRC16_ARC, CRC16_IBM, CRC16_LHA ||
|| CRC16_CCITT || 0x1021 || 0 || 0 || Yes || CRC16_KERMIT ||
|| CRC16_CCITT_FALSE || 0x1021 || 0xFFFF || 0 || No ||  ||
|| CRC16_MAXIM || 0x8005 || 0 || 0xFFFF || Yes ||  ||
|| CRC16_USB || 0x8005 || 0xFFFF || 0xFFFF || Yes ||  ||
|| CRC16_X25 || 0x1021 || 0xFFFF || 0xFFFF || Yes ||  ||
|| CRC16_XMODEM || 0x1021 || 0 || 0 || No || CRC16_ZMODEM ||
|| CRC16_XKERMIT || 0x8408 || 0 || 0 || Yes ||  ||
|| CRC24 || 0x864CFB || 0xB704CE || 0 || No || CRC24_OPENPGP ||
|| CRC32 || 0x04C11DB7 || 0xFFFFFFFF || 0xFFFFFFFF || Yes || CRC32_PKZIP, CRC32_ITU ||
|| CRC32_BZIP2 || 0x04C11DB7 || 0xFFFFFFFF || 0xFFFFFFFF || No ||  ||
|| CRC32_ISCSI || 0x1EDC6F41 || 0xFFFFFFFF || 0xFFFFFFFF || Yes ||  ||
|| CRC32_JAM || 0x04C11DB7 || 0xFFFFFFFF || 0 || Yes ||  ||
|| CRC32_POSIX || 0x04C11DB7 || 0 || 0xFFFFFFFF || No || CRC32_CKSUM ||
|| CRC32_MPEG2 || 0x04C11DB7 || 0xFFFFFFFF || 0 || No ||  ||
|| CRC64 || 0x42F0E1EBA9EA3693 || 0 || 0 || No ||  ||
|| CRC64_WE || 0x42F0E1EBA9EA3693 || 0xFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFF || 0xFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFF || No ||  ||
|| CRC64_ISO || 0x000000000000001B || 0 || 0 || Yes ||  ||
|| CRC64_JONES || 0xAD93D23594C935A9  || 0 || 0 || Yes ||  ||


More information and other standards can be found here:
